notification.row.defaultText: You were mentioned in a request. Click here to view.
_notification.row.defaultText.comment: Default notification a user sees if they were mentioned in a request.
notification.title: Notifications
_notifications.title.comment: Notification title displayed in the opening panel
_noNotification.text.comment: Text displayed in the notification panel when a user have no notifications

formElements._datePicker.ariaLabel.comment: Default aria label for date picker components

languageDropdown.ariaLabel: Language dropdown, use arrow keys if using tab navigation to select a language
_languageDropdown.ariaLabel.comment: Aria label for language select dropdown in action bar on top of the page

shortString._more.comment: Show more label for long text
shortString._less.comment: Show less label for long text

complianceWarning.title: Compliance Warning
complianceWarning.body: This app is currently in pilot test phase. Do NOT put any real client or sensitive in this app at this time.

errors.unauthenticated: Your access token is expired or invalid. Please login again to continue

getTimeDuration._hours.comment: Abbreviated time duration unit for Hours
getTimeDuration._minutes.comment: Abbreviated time duration unit for Minutes
getTimeDuration._seconds.comment: Abbreviated time duration unit for Seconds

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.subtitle: The page you are trying to access is not found or available.
